author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR replicates the reduced ProcessHistory tests (based on mocked CMSSW version) that I added in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47032 for the streamer file format.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1140

#### PR validation:

Added unit test runs
title: Replicate the mocked version -based reduced ProcessHistory tests for streamer file format
